sentences.sentence: More nurseries will be built to fill the need for high-quality child care.
sentences.translation: 将建立更多的托儿所以满足高质量儿童保育的需要。

sentences.sentence: Nurseries were established in various areas during the late half of the 19th century; most of them were charitable.
sentences.translation: 19世纪下半叶，各地都建立了托儿所；大多数都是慈善性质的。

sentences.sentence: In some European countries nurseries were established even in munitions plants, under direct government sponsorship.
sentences.translation: 在一些欧洲国家，甚至在军火厂也建立了托儿所，由政府直接赞助。
